Articles.Content:
For thoose like me who'd like too.

:HailVeggie:

I'm sorry but I eat them. Often with a good meat dish, or integrated into a meat dish. I simply cannot hail vegetables and eat them at the same time.

(Also, I REFUSE to use the expression "veggie". Even though I am American, I vastly prefer the chiefly British expression "fruit and veg". Sounds a lot less childish than "veggie", plus it's quicker to say.)

> 
> What the hell?

> 
> I don't get it.

Me neither. 

![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

EDIT: Oh? I guess this popped up at all (and not only that, but in spaceflight) because they are eating veggies in space. Wait, then this should be **:killveggies:**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T11:48:52Z" title="08/11/2015 11:48  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**

Wake me when you grow me a steak. 

:hailmeat:

> 
> Wake me when you grow me a steak. 
> :hailmeat:

We did that a while ago: [http://www.washingtonpost.com/news/wonkblog/wp/2015/05/20/meet-the-future-of-meat-a-10-lab-grown-hamburger-that-tastes-as-good-as-the-real-thing/](http://www.washingtonpost.com/news/wonkblog/wp/2015/05/20/meet-the-future-of-meat-a-10-lab-grown-hamburger-that-tastes-as-good-as-the-real-thing/)

Hey, I'm not a tremendous fan of veggies, but eating nothing but mac 'n' cheese paste and freeze-dried steak slabs for months would make me say :hailveggies: upon my triumphant return to Earth.

I would only be hailing vegetables for about five seconds though. After that, I would be eating them. And hailing something you're actively grinding to a pulp is a little weird. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

-Upsilon

so much whine ... it's the :HailVeggie: thread do it the way you want but just :hailveggie: and that's all xDr

![pommard-2010-181x340.jpg](http://www.gourmetsandco.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/pommard-2010-181x340.jpg) whatever the way you're able do it ; ) thks for passing by over Paris a litl' few "time" ago ; )

Cheers ; )

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T18:59:41Z" title="08/11/2015 06:59  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by WinkAllKerb''**

:hailhuman:

Make way for the greatest exotic species of fur-less sentient psychotic ape species **I****N** **T****H****E UNI****VER****SE!**

Elmo R. Zumwalt, US Naval Admiral, served from 1942 to 1974 and in WWII, the Korean war, and the Vietnam war. Born in 1920, Died 2000.

Hey guys!~ Let's roleplay!
